html: We're helping people keep more of what they earn by: Raising the personal allowance to £12,500. Saving a typical basic rate taxpayer £1,205 a year compared to 2010. Keeping our promise on income tax one year early. #Budget2018pic.twitter.com/GO2QwezO38
text:
We're helping people keep more of what they earn by:
 
 Raising the personal allowance to £12,500.
 Saving a typical basic rate taxpayer £1,205 a year compared to 2010.
 Keeping our promise on income tax one year early.
 
 #Budget2018pic.twitter.com/GO2QwezO38

html: Hampshire Conservative MP @AlanMakMP tells Parliament "I've called for the report's findings to be acted upon, so people are held accountable for what happened. More transparency can give the families the hope of justice, just as transparency helped the Hillsborough families."
text: Hampshire Conservative MP @AlanMakMP tells Parliament "I've called for the report's findings to be acted upon, so people are held accountable for what happened. More transparency can give the families the hope of justice, just as transparency helped the Hillsborough families."
